data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 2, Monterrey are coming forward and Vincent Janssen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 4, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Akron.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
In the minute 7, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, Monterrey have a dangerous throw-in.
In Zapopan Monterrey attack through Dorlan Pabon. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
In the minute 10, Guadalajara's Alexis Vega has run offside.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Monterrey.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Monterrey.
In the minute 17, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 22, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Monterrey.
Free kick Monterrey.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 35, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Monterrey's Aviles Hurtado scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 40, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 42, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Jesus Sanchez returns to the field for Guadalajara after picking up a slight injury.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
In the minute 47, Aviles Hurtado of Monterrey gets in a strike, but is off target.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Guadalajara, close to Monterrey's area.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Jesus Angulo is replacing Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Ake Arnaud Loba (Monterrey) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 55, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Antonio Briseno.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Monterreyâ€™s Vincent Janssen and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 58, Vincent Janssen is back on the pitch.
Antonio Briseno has recovered and rejoins the match in Zapopan.
Sebastian Vegas is replacing Ake Arnaud Loba for the away team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Monterrey's half.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
In the minute 64, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Akron with Angel Zaldivar replacing Jesus Molina.
In the minute 66, Monterrey are pushing forward but Vincent Janssen's finish is wide of the goal.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Fernando Beltran (Guadalajara) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows against Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela for offside.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Maximiliano Meza is on a sub for Dorlan Pabon for Monterrey.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Monterrey.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Monterrey.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Monterrey.
Monterrey pushes forward through Vincent Janssen, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Guadalajara.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a third substitution, with Oribe Peralta replacing Antonio Briseno.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Fernando Beltran with Alan Torres. This is the fourth substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
The away team replace Angel Zapata with Arturo Gonzalez.
Monterrey make their fourth substitution with Rogelio Funes Mori replacing Vincent Janssen.
In the minute 79, Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a fifth substitution, with Carlos Rodriguez replacing Aviles Hurtado.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Monterrey's half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Angel Zaldivar.
In the minute 84, Goal! Alexis Vega gives Guadalajara a 2-1 lead.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Monterrey.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Monterrey's Arturo Gonzalez has been booked in Zapopan.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Zapopan.
At Estadio Akron the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
Goal! Jesus Angulo extends Guadalajara's lead to 3-1.
